text:
New blog post up...Why Not Pot?!?!? 
https://t.co/czc8yg19AW
After watching my dad needlessly suffer while fighting cancer without cannabis only cemented the fight in me for an end to cannabis prohibition. #MedicalMarijuana #Cancer #MMJ #Cannabis  #CBD #PlantsNotPills #pot https://t.co/PYlk4sOXbB
